explanations.machine learning: The abstract explicitly mentions the use of machine learning (ML) methods for credit risk assessment.
explanations.classification: The paper proposes a clustering based fuzzy classification (CBFC) method, which involves classification tasks for credit risk evaluation.
explanations.clustering: The method uses fuzzy k-means clustering algorithm to obtain membership values for better capturing the structure of the system.
explanations.feature representation: The abstract discusses the selection of features contributing to default risk, which relates to feature representation in the context of machine learning.
